text: Mack Swain (born Moroni Swain; February 16, 1876 - August 25, 1935) was an early American actor. He appeared in many of Mack Sennettâ€™s comedies at Keystone Studios. He also appeared in some Charlie Chaplin movies. ==References== Category:1876 births Category:1935 deaths Category:American silent movie actors Category:American stage actors Category:Vaudeville performers Category:Comedians from Utah Category:Actors from Salt Lake City, Utah
